(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP You))
      (VP (VBP know)
        (NP
          (NP (DT those) (NNS guys))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP own)
                (NP
                  (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJS latest) (NN tech) (NNS gadgets))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP (NN everytime)))))))))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP see)
      (NP (PRP them))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (MD will)
            (VP (VB tell)
              (NP (PRP you))
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ new) (NN handphone))))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(know-2, You-1)
dep(see-15, know-2)
det(guys-4, those-3)
dobj(know-2, guys-4)
nsubj(own-6, who-5)
rcmod(guys-4, own-6)
predet(gadgets-11, all-7)
det(gadgets-11, the-8)
amod(gadgets-11, latest-9)
nn(gadgets-11, tech-10)
dobj(own-6, gadgets-11)
cc(gadgets-11, and-12)
conj(gadgets-11, everytime-13)
nsubj(see-15, you-14)
root(ROOT-0, see-15)
dobj(see-15, them-16)
nsubj(tell-19, they-17)
aux(tell-19, will-18)
dep(see-15, tell-19)
dobj(tell-19, you-20)
prep(tell-19, about-21)
poss(handphone-24, their-22)
amod(handphone-24, new-23)
pobj(about-21, handphone-24)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am) (RB not)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP them)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, I-1)
cop(one-4, am-2)
neg(one-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, them-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT Neither))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (NP (PRP I)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN type))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN person)))))
      (SBAR
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB still))
              (VP (VBG holding)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (PP (TO to)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN handphone))
                      (PP (IN with)
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ black)
                          (CC and)
                          (JJ white) (NN LCD))))))))))
        (CC or)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (MD might)
              (VP (VB call)
                (NP (DT a) (NNP Techo) (NNP Laggard))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(type-5, Neither-1)
cop(type-5, am-2)
dep(type-5, I-3)
det(type-5, the-4)
root(ROOT-0, type-5)
prep(type-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, person-7)
nsubj(holding-11, who-8)
aux(holding-11, are-9)
advmod(holding-11, still-10)
dep(type-5, holding-11)
prep(holding-11, on-12)
pcomp(on-12, to-13)
det(handphone-15, a-14)
pobj(to-13, handphone-15)
prep(handphone-15, with-16)
det(LCD-21, a-17)
amod(LCD-21, black-18)
cc(black-18, and-19)
conj(black-18, white-20)
pobj(with-16, LCD-21)
cc(holding-11, or-22)
dobj(call-26, what-23)
nsubj(call-26, they-24)
aux(call-26, might-25)
conj(holding-11, call-26)
det(Laggard-29, a-27)
nn(Laggard-29, Techo-28)
dobj(call-26, Laggard-29)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB like)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB think)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (PRP myself)))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN someone) (NN sort))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN middle))
                        (SBAR
                          (WHNP (WP who))
                          (S
                            (VP (MD would)
                              (VP (VB wait)
                                (SBAR (IN until)
                                  (S
                                    (NP (DT the) (NN technology))
                                    (VP (VBZ is)
                                      (ADVP (RB suitably))
                                      (VP (VBN matured)
                                        (PP (IN before)
                                          (S
                                            (VP (VBG adopting)
                                              (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(like-3, I-1)
aux(like-3, would-2)
root(ROOT-0, like-3)
aux(think-5, to-4)
xcomp(like-3, think-5)
prep(think-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, myself-7)
prep(think-5, as-8)
nn(sort-10, someone-9)
pobj(as-8, sort-10)
prep(sort-10, of-11)
pcomp(of-11, in-12)
det(middle-14, the-13)
pobj(in-12, middle-14)
nsubj(wait-17, who-15)
aux(wait-17, would-16)
rcmod(middle-14, wait-17)
mark(matured-23, until-18)
det(technology-20, the-19)
nsubjpass(matured-23, technology-20)
auxpass(matured-23, is-21)
advmod(matured-23, suitably-22)
advcl(wait-17, matured-23)
prep(matured-23, before-24)
pcomp(before-24, adopting-25)
dobj(adopting-25, it-26)
